attributes.additional_details: Cancel all January exams as hospital staff are in pressure! You are putting everyone at risk including vulnerables! Please don't fail your Government Boris! You are playing with lives.
attributes.background: You are putting everyone at risk by continuing this exams. What if someone gets infected after the exams? Will you be the murder Gavin Williamson? By, which point of view is it safe to continue exams where hospitals are in pressure!
